mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_dev_task_scm_history ( DEV_TASK_ID, DEV_USER_ID, SCM_TYPE, COMMIT_NUMBER, COMMIT_MASSAGE, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{devTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{devUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scmType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{commitNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commitMassage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(tdts.ID) countScm,COUNT(DISTINCT tdts.CREATE_BY) countScmPeople FROM tbl_dev_task_scm_history tdts LEFT JOIN tbl_dev_task tdt ON tdts.DEV_TASK_ID=tdt.ID AND tdt.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_feature trf ON tdt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID = trf.ID AND trf.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON trf.SYSTEM_ID = tsi.ID AND tsi.STATUS=1 WHERE tdts.STATUS=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId} AND datediff(now(),tdts.CREATE_DATE)<=#{day}

select a.click_date CREATE_DATE,ifnull(b.countCommit,0) countScm from ( SELECT curdate() as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 2 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 3 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 4 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 5 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 6 day) as click_date ) a LEFT JOIN ( select count(*) countCommit,DATE_FORMAT(tdts.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') createTime from tbl_dev_task_scm_history tdts LEFT JOIN tbl_dev_task tdt ON tdts.DEV_TASK_ID=tdt.ID AND tdt.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_feature trf ON tdt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID = trf.ID AND trf.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON trf.SYSTEM_ID = tsi.ID AND tsi.STATUS=1 WHERE tdts.STATUS=1 AND tsi.ID=#{systemId} group by createTime ) b on a.click_date = b.createTime ORDER BY CREATE_DATE
